chinese: 堆肥并不一定需要无病原微生物。

english: Other agents can cause similar syndromes .
chinese: 其它病原也可引起相似的综合症。

english: They have been able to trace the source in fewer than 40 per cent of reported cases .
chinese: 已报道的病例中，找到病原的不到40%。

english: In such situations specific laboratory tests are necessary to establish the etiology .
chinese: 在此情况下，需要特异性实验来确定病原。

english: Confirmation is accomplished by demonstration of specific antibodies or by isolation studies .
chinese: 特异性抗体的证明或病原分离可以用来确诊。
病原造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Nonexposure of susceptible plant populations to their pathogens is fairly common .
chinese: 感病的植物群体不暴露在它们的病原之下，这是相当普遍的。

english: Without competition from other organisms, the pathogen may grow very rapidly with serious damage .
chinese: 没有其他生物的竞争病原生长迅速，危害严重。

english: By use of the agglutination test healthy carriers of the organisms have been identified .
chinese: 通过凝集实验的应用，已经证实了病原微生物的健康带菌者。

english: The occurrence of a disease in a particular locality may indicate the etiology and nature of the disease .
chinese: 某一疾病在某一特定地区的发生可能暗示该病的病原学和性质。

english: Pasteurellosis denotes an infectious disease in which the microorgunisms pasteurella multocida or pasteurella hemolytyca are causally involved .
chinese: 巴氏杆菌病是病原涉及多杀性巴氏杆菌或溶血性巴氏杆菌的一种传染病。

english: Etiological analysis of specimen infected by surgery
chinese: 外科感染性标本的病原学分析

english: They carried out a research into the cause of cancer
chinese: 他们对癌的病原进行研究。
病原微生物感染与自身免疫性疾病

english: Epidemiology and ecology of bovine tuberculosis
chinese: 牛结核病病原生态学和流行病学研究
